author: marlae
title: IDology Announces Strategic Equity Investment in Payfone and Launch of ExpectID Mobile to Enhance Mobile Security and Ease of Use
text:
Posted by marlae on Oct 19th, 2015 in Featured Stories , Press Release | 0 comments -Launch of IDology’s ExpectID Mobile Solution, utilizing Payfone’s network authentication services, to help organizations deliver a seamless and secure mobile experience with added trust and reduced customer friction- 
IDology, a leader in multi-layered identity verification and fraud prevention solutions for the customer- not-present environment, today announced a strategic equity investment in Payfone, a leading network 
authentication provider. IDology has also integrated the Payfone solution as part of its ExpectID Mobile 
Solution to better reduce risk associated with mobile devices and improve the mobile commerce 
experience. 
“IDology is a leading solutions platform for identity verification and fraud prevention that assists 
customers with account origination and step-up authentication,” said John Dancu, chief executive officer 
of IDology. “Our partnership with Payfone strengthens our identity verification and fraud prevention 
process and also enables IDology to provide network authentication and transaction monitoring for 
ongoing transactions. Payfone will be a key partner with us in the advancement of solutions for the 
mobile environment. Our decision to invest in Payfone’s business stems from our commitment to enable 
mobile solutions that strike a balance between convenience and security and deliver personal, secure 
and frictionless access to products and services.” 
IDology will combine its multi-layered ID verification and fraud prevention platform with Payfone’s 
unparalleled mobile security services. The result is a powerful mobile security solution, ExpectID Mobile. 
Now, customers using IDology’s ExpectID Mobile solution can seamlessly establish, maintain and trust a 
mobile identity associated with a legitimate consumer. 
“IDology is an excellent strategic partner for Payfone as we continue to develop solutions that help 
businesses fight mobile fraud,” said Rodger Desai, chief executive officer of Payfone. “Payfone already 
exclusively serves as a critical ingredient to the bank consortium that helps traditional banks and FSOs 
fight fraud, with this new partnership, we are excited to bring capabilities to additional markets such 
alternative finance and payment gateways, healthcare, medical and retail through IDology. Through 
IDology integrating Payfone’s services as part of their mobile solution these businesses will be now be 
able to better to serve legitimate customers and also understand the risks they face on mobile. 
“Establishing a mobile identity is a complex challenge,” said Dancu. “This is due to a number of reasons 
such as the rise in mobile account takeovers, improved mobile spoofing technology and the millions of 
change events that occur with mobile devices such as a consumer porting a device between carriers. 
ExpectID Mobile allows organizations to establish a mobile identity for a consumer that is persistent 
through numerous different life cycle change events and is resistant to mobile fraud tactics. When a 
customer signs up for an account on a mobile device, the IDology solution first verifies the consumer’s 
identity and ensures that there are no fraud flags associated with it. Then, ExpectID Mobile is able to 
create a mobile bind, or persistent identity, for that consumer. This mobile identity can be used to 
streamline ongoing transactions and ensures the legitimate user is performing the action, instead of a 
fraudster. The persistent mobile identity can also be created independent of an identity verification.” 
ExpectID Mobile operates seamlessly within IDology’s platform, allowing organizations to verify that the 
consumer is who they say they are, bind them to a trusted mobile identity, confirm this mobile identity 
bind upon customer log-in and escalate to a higher level of verification only when needed. This is all 
delivered in an on-demand technology platform that enables businesses to determine their own 
business rules based on their own specific requirements. 
About IDology, Inc. 
IDology, Inc. provides real-time technology solutions that verify an individual’s identity and age for 
anyone conducting business in a consumer-not-present environment to help drive revenue, decrease 
costs, prevent fraud and meet compliance regulations. Founded in 2003, IDology offers a solution-driven 
approach to identity verification and fraud prevention that ultimately helps increase customer 
acquisition and improve customer experience. IDology has developed an innovative and on-demand 
technology platform that allows customers to control the entire proofing process and provides the 
flexibility to make configuration changes that are deployed automatically – without having to rely on 
internal IT resources or IDology’s customer service – so customers can stay ahead of the fraud landscape 
while maintaining compliance. For more information, visit www.IDology.com or call 866-520-1234. 
About Payfone 
Payfone is a leader in Mobile Identity Authentication. Payfone’s suite of network authentication services 
provides unparalleled mobile security while eliminating friction from the customer experience. The 
company is backed by leading venture firms, financial institutions, Mobile Network Operators, and Early 
Warning Services and is based in New York. Follow Payfone on Twitter @payfone.
